name: Tree 0018 : Escher Tree
description:
Why this Penrose triangle? Oscar Reutersvärd is the real pioneer of impossible constructions but Roger Penrose rediscovered this figure in 1934 and Escher was inspired by it (tnx Wiki).
And why Escher? One day, I was offered a book on Escher. I asked who is it? You'll see, your drawings make me think of him. Today, many years later, if sometimes I play mentally with 3d, I can say that I will never equal Escher, I will never have his mathematical rigor nor his patience and I never use a ruler or of compass. I just escape with a stroke of the pencil and sometimes geometric constructions occur... That's all!
